abstract.shortdesc: This section of the specification contains examples of DITA maps. The examples illustrate the wide variety of purposes that DITA maps serve.

draft-comment.author: Kristen Eberlein
draft-comment.p: The children topic were relocated from thr "DITA map elements" topic. They each need a short description and more contextual information that clarifies the importance of the example, that is, why we think the example should be in the DITA specification.
